name: Train Trouble (assertchris)
description:
The train needs water and coal to function. If you run out of these things (indicated at the top of the screen) then it's game over. You can refill coal by putting down what you're holding (either the gun or the bucket), moving to the front of the train, and pressing the use key.

You can refill the water by holding the bucket, refilling it over the middle car, moving to the front of the train, and pressing the use key.

You can refill your gun ammo by moving to the back of the car and pressing the use key.

Chase the bandits away by shooting at them. You need to be over the car they are attacking in order to aim at them. They take 2-4 shots to chase away.

As they shoot, your train will lose health (indicated underneath the train), and when that reaches zero (of you run out of water or coal) you'll lose the game.

This is a game I put together for the Nokia 3310 jam.

Planning to add more to this, including menu and score systems, but running shot on time for the jam.
